sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading down 0.1%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 22.9% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Exxon Mobil ( XOM ), trading down 2.8%.
Exxon Mobil is lower by about 21.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 2.8%, and Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading down 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
